content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0 y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(y=-80.0)
- Burner mining drill (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) and a burner inserter at position(y=-79.5)
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.5 y=-78.5) and a burner inserter at position(y=-78.5)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Stone furnace (position x=60.0 y=-60.0)
- Transport belt (position x=63.5 y=-53.5) and transport belt (position x=64.5 y=-53.5)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5 y=-32.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), boiler (position x=111.5 y=-32.0), and steam engine (position x=117.5 y=-30.5)

### Pipe group at position(x=107.5 y=-34.5)
Consists of pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and pipe group (position x=105.5 y=-32.5)

### Belt group at position(x=40.5 y=-83.5)
Consists of belt group (position x=40.5 y=-83.5)


# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when burner mining drill has no fuel
- Ensure that the burner mining drill has a fuel source before attempting to mine.

### Errors when stone furnace has no fuel
- Ensure that the stone furnace has a fuel source before attempting to smelt.

### Errors when burner inserter is waiting for source items
- Ensure that the burner inserter has a source of items to insert before attempting to insert.

### Errors when stone furnace has no ingredients
- Ensure that the stone furnace has the required ingredients before attempting to smelt.

### Errors when offshore pump is working but has no fuel
- Ensure that the offshore pump has a fuel source before attempting to pump.

### Errors when boiler has no fuel
- Ensure that the boiler has a fuel source before attempting to boil.

### Errors when steam engine is not connected
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a power source before attempting to generate power.

### Errors when pipe group is empty
- Ensure that the pipe group has a fluid source before attempting to transport fluid.

### Errors when electricity group is not plugged into electric network
- Ensure that the electricity group is plugged into an electric network before attempting to generate power.


# NAMESPACE
* No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
* No important variables have been assigned.
